name: ghost-gem
effect: Held : When the holder uses a damaging ghost-type move, the move has 1.5× power and this item is consumed.
short_effect: Held: When the holder uses a damaging ghost-type move, the move has 1.5× power and this item is consumed.

flavor_text.x_y: A gem with a spectral essence. When held, it strengthens the power of a Ghost-type move one time.
